DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel With Rapid Hormonal Cycling Treatment Patients With Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis prostate adenocarcinoma histologically confirm MSKCC SKCCC . Patient must serum testosterone > 180 ng/dl . Karnofsky performance status ( KPS ) > _70 % . Patients must adequate organ function define follow laboratory criterion : WBC > _ 3500/mm3 ANC > _1500/mm3 Platelet count > 100,000/mm3 Hemoglobin > 8.0g/dL Creatinine < 1.6mg/dl Total Bilirubin WNL ( unless due Gilbert 's disease LFTs WNL ) SGOT SGPT If alkaline phosphatase _ < 2.5 x ULN , elevation AST/ALT ; OR AST/ALT _ < 1.5 x ULN , elevation alkaline phos Prior hormonal therapy allow : 1 . Neoadjuvant treatment prior radiation therapy radical pmstatectomy , provide total duration therapy exceed 6 month ( Proscar consider hormone therapy ) . 2 . One cycle intermittent therapy maximum exposure 6 month ( Proscar consider hormone therapy ) . Patients must least 18 year age . Patients must sign informed consent document state understand investigational nature propose treatment Clinically significant cardiac disease ( New York Heart Association Class III/IV ) , severe debilitate pulmonary disease . Uncontrolled serious active infection . Anticipated survival le 3 month . Active CNS epiduraltumor Inability unwillingness comply treatment protocol , followup , research test Peripheral neuropathy > _ grade 3 . Patients history severe hypersensitivity reaction drug formulate polysorbate 80 . Men childbearing potential must willing consent use effective contraception treatment least 6 month completion treatment . Prior chemotherapy Concomitant use phenytoin , carbamazepine , barbiturate , rifampicin , phenobarbital , St. Johns 's Wort ( hypericum perforatum ) ketoconazole prohibit .
